sqls.sql: select distinct "商品分類" as value, substr("商品分類",4) as text from "NEW_出品マスタ情報" order by "商品分類"
select distinct "商品管理番号" as value, "商品管理番号" as text from "VIEW_商品詳細情報" V_MST order by "商品管理番号"

select TEMP."データ種別" as importtype, TEMP."基準日時" as basetime from ( select T."データ種別", T."導入日時", T."基準日時", T."導入件数", ROW_NUMBER() OVER(partition BY T."データ種別" ORDER BY T."導入日時" DESC) NB from "データ導入履歴" T where T."店舗名" = :shop ) TEMP where NB = 1

SELECT V_MST."req_no" , V_MST."subpq" , V_MST."subcq" , V_MST."sizeindex" , V_MST."商品分類" as productdiv , V_MST."商品管理番号" as productno , V_MST."商品種別" as productkinds , case when V_MST."商品種別" = '親商品' then 'display: none;' else '' end as displayflg , V_MST."色" as color , V_MST."サイズ" as size , V_MST."SKU番号" as sku , V_MST."ASIN番号" as asin , V_MST."ラベル番号" as label , V_MST."商品名" as productname , V_MST."価格" as price , V_STOCK."発送方式" as ship , V_STOCK."FBM在庫数量" as fbm , V_STOCK."FBA在庫数量" as fba , V_STOCK."LOCAL在庫数量" as localstock , V_STOCK."ONBOARD在庫数量" as onboard , V_STOCK."販売中在庫合計" as stockonsell , V_STOCK."予備在庫合計" as stockprepare , V_STOCK."全体在庫合計" as stockall , RIGHT(' ' || cast(V_SELL."前日数量" as varchar), 3) as selled1 , RIGHT(' ' || cast(V_SELL."7日間数量" as varchar), 3) as selled7 , RIGHT(' ' || cast(V_SELL."30日間数量" as varchar), 3) as selled30 , RIGHT(' ' || cast(V_SELL."60日間数量" as varchar), 3) as selled60 , RIGHT(' ' || cast(V_SELL."90日間数量" as varchar), 3) as selled90 , ROUND( ( V_SELL."前日数量" * 0.05 + V_SELL."7日間数量" / 7::numeric * 0.15 + V_SELL."30日間数量" / 30::numeric * 0.3 + V_SELL."60日間数量" / 60::numeric * 0.3 + V_SELL."90日間数量" / 90::numeric * 0.2 ) * 7 , 2 ) as selledweek , CASE WHEN V_SELL."前日数量" = 0 and V_SELL."7日間数量" = 0 and V_SELL."30日間数量" = 0 and V_SELL."60日間数量" = 0 and V_SELL."90日間数量" = 0 THEN 9999 ELSE ROUND( V_STOCK."販売中在庫合計" / ( V_SELL."前日数量" * 0.05 + V_SELL."7日間数量" / 7::numeric * 0.15 + V_SELL."30日間数量" / 30::numeric * 0.3 + V_SELL."60日間数量" / 60::numeric * 0.3 + V_SELL."90日間数量" / 90::numeric * 0.2 ) , 2 ) END as onsellweek , CASE WHEN V_SELL."前日数量" = 0 and V_SELL."7日間数量" = 0 and V_SELL."30日間数量" = 0 and V_SELL."60日間数量" = 0 and V_SELL."90日間数量" = 0 THEN 9999 ELSE ROUND( V_STOCK."全体在庫合計" / ( V_SELL."前日数量" * 0.05 + V_SELL."7日間数量" / 7::numeric * 0.15 + V_SELL."30日間数量" / 30::numeric * 0.3 + V_SELL."60日間数量" / 60::numeric * 0.3 + V_SELL."90日間数量" / 90::numeric * 0.2 ) , 2 ) END as onsellweekall FROM "VIEW_商品詳細情報" V_MST LEFT JOIN "VIEW_商品在庫情報" V_STOCK ON V_MST."SKU番号" = V_STOCK."SKU番号" AND V_MST."ASIN番号" = V_STOCK."ASIN番号" LEFT JOIN "VIEW_商品販売情報" V_SELL ON V_MST."SKU番号" = V_SELL."SKU番号" AND V_MST."ASIN番号" = V_SELL."ASIN番号" WHERE 1 = 1 AND ( V_MST."商品分類" = !productdivstr1 OR V_MST."商品分類" = !productdivstr2 OR V_MST."商品分類" = !productdivstr3 OR V_MST."商品分類" = !productdivstr4 OR V_MST."商品分類" = !productdivstr5 OR V_MST."商品分類" = !productdivstr6 OR V_MST."商品分類" = !productdivstr7 OR V_MST."商品分類" = !productdivstr8 )
AND ( V_MST."商品管理番号" is NULL V_MST."商品管理番号" = !productno )
AND ( UPPER(V_MST."商品名") LIKE concat('%', !keyword ,'%') OR UPPER(V_MST."色") LIKE concat('%', !keyword ,'%') OR UPPER(V_MST."サイズ") LIKE concat('%', !keyword ,'%') OR UPPER(V_MST."SKU番号") LIKE concat('%', !keyword ,'%') OR UPPER(V_MST."ASIN番号") LIKE concat('%', !keyword ,'%') OR UPPER(V_MST."ラベル番号") LIKE concat('%', !keyword ,'%') )
AND ( V_MST."商品種別" = '子商品' )
AND ( V_MST."商品管理番号" in ( SELECT productno FROM ( SELECT V_MST."商品管理番号" as productno , ROUND( ( V_SELL."前日数量" * 0.05 + V_SELL."7日間数量" / 7 ::numeric * 0.15 + V_SELL."30日間数量" / 30 ::numeric * 0.3 + V_SELL."60日間数量" / 60 ::numeric * 0.3 + V_SELL."90日間数量" / 90 ::numeric * 0.2 ) * 7 , 2 ) as selledweek FROM "VIEW_商品詳細情報" V_MST LEFT JOIN "VIEW_商品販売情報" V_SELL ON V_MST."SKU番号" = V_SELL."SKU番号" AND V_MST."ASIN番号" = V_SELL."ASIN番号" ) T WHERE 1 = 1
and selledweek >= cast(!sellfrom as float)
and selledweek >= cast(!sellto as float)
) )
AND ( ( cast(V_STOCK."FBA在庫数量" as int) > 0 OR V_STOCK."FBM在庫数量" is NULL OR cast(V_STOCK."FBM在庫数量" as int) = 0 AND cast(V_STOCK."FBA在庫数量" as int) = 0 ) AND CASE WHEN V_SELL."前日数量" = 0 and V_SELL."7日間数量" = 0 and V_SELL."30日間数量" = 0 and V_SELL."60日間数量" = 0 and V_SELL."90日間数量" = 0 THEN 9999 ELSE ROUND( V_STOCK."販売中在庫合計" / ( V_SELL."前日数量" * 0.05 + V_SELL."7日間数量" / 7::numeric * 0.15 + V_SELL."30日間数量" / 30::numeric * 0.3 + V_SELL."60日間数量" / 60::numeric * 0.3 + V_SELL."90日間数量" / 90::numeric * 0.2 ) , 2 ) END <= cast(!selldayford as float) )
AND (
CASE WHEN V_SELL."前日数量" = 0 and V_SELL."7日間数量" = 0 and V_SELL."30日間数量" = 0 and V_SELL."60日間数量" = 0 and V_SELL."90日間数量" = 0 THEN 9999 ELSE ROUND( V_STOCK."全体在庫合計" / ( V_SELL."前日数量" * 0.05 + V_SELL."7日間数量" / 7::numeric * 0.15 + V_SELL."30日間数量" / 30::numeric * 0.3 + V_SELL."60日間数量" / 60::numeric * 0.3 + V_SELL."90日間数量" / 90::numeric * 0.2 ) , 2 ) END <= cast(!selldayforp as float) )
ORDER BY V_MST."req_no"
update "NEW_在庫情報" set "LOCAL在庫数量" = :local where "SKU番号" = :sku and "ASIN番号" = :asin

+ V_SELL."30日間数量" / 30::numeric * 0.3 + V_SELL."60日間数量" / 60::numeric * 0.3 + V_SELL."90日間数量" / 90::numeric * 0.2 ) , 2 ) END as onsellweekall , PCD."数量" as purchase FROM "VIEW_商品詳細情報" V_MST LEFT JOIN
